iti41:2.1: “Te, bhikkhave, sattā suparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnā.
iti41:2.2: Te diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharanti savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
iti41:2.3: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
iti41:2.4: Te, bhikkhave, sattā aparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya aparihīnā.
iti41:2.5: Te diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharanti avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
iti41:2.6: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
iti41:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
